  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChatReplyMessage
    Chat message sent from the server to the client as a reply to a chat request message
    CommonGoalCompleteMessage
    message to notify that a player completed the common goal card
    DisconnectionMessage
    message sent to client to notify the disconnection of a player
    ErrorMessage
    message used to notify an error to the client
    GenericMessage
    message used to show a generic text during the game
    InfoGameMessage
    message used to send to the client information about the game (players and number)
    InsertTilesRequestMessage
    message sent to the client to insert the selected tiles into the bookshelf
    LoginReplyMessage
    message sent to client to notify if the login is successful or not
    NumPlayersRequestMessage
    message used to ask the client to choose the number of players in the game
    OrderRequestMessage
    message used to ask the order of the tiles inserting in the bookshelf
    PingMessage
    message used to keep the connection alive
    ScoresMessage
    message used to show the final ranking scores of the players
    SelectTileRequestMessage
    message sent to client to request to select tiles from the board
    ShowBoardMessage
    message sent to the client to show the board
    ShowBookshelfMessage
    message to show the client his bookshelf
    ShowCommonCardsMessage
    message used to show the common goal cards of the game
    ShowCommonScoresMessage
     
    ShowPersonalCardMessage
    message used to show the personal goal card
    WinnerPlayerMessage
    message to notify the winner player of the game
